00038 #define OC_MINI(_a,_b)      ((_a)>(_b)?(_b):(_a))
00039 #define OC_MAXI(_a,_b)      ((_a)<(_b)?(_b):(_a))
00040 #define OC_CLAMPI(_a,_b,_c) (OC_MAXI(_a,OC_MINI(_b,_c)))

00047 typedef struct _KviTheoraGeometry {
00048         //original geometry, set by user
00049         int pic_w;
00050         int pic_h;
00051         //calculated geometry: frame
00052         int frame_w;
00053         int frame_h;
00054         //calculated geometry: offset
00055         int pic_x;
00056         int pic_y;
00057 } KviTheoraGeometry;

00059 class KVILIB_API KviTheoraEncoder {
00060 public:
00061         KviTheoraEncoder(KviDataBuffer * stream, int iWidth=320, int iHeight=240, int iFpsN=5, int iFpsD=1, int iParN=4, int iParD=3);
00062         virtual ~KviTheoraEncoder();
00063         void addVideoFrame(QRgb * rgb32, int videoSize);
00064         void addAudioFrame(unsigned char* audioPkt, int audioSize);
00065 private:
00066         int fetch_and_process_video(quint8 * videoYuv,ogg_page *videopage,ogg_stream_state *to,th_enc_ctx *td,int videoflag);
00067         int fetch_and_process_video_packet(quint8 * videoYuv,th_enc_ctx *td,ogg_packet *op);
00068         int fetch_and_process_audio(quint8 * audio, int size, ogg_page *audiopage, ogg_stream_state *vo, vorbis_dsp_state *vd, vorbis_block *vb, int audioflag);
00069 private:
00070         KviTheoraGeometry geometry;
00071         KviDataBuffer * m_pStream;
00072         quint8 * videoYuv;
00073 
00074         bool audio;
00075         int audio_ch;
00076         int audio_hz;
00077         float audio_q;
00078         ogg_int64_t samples_sofar;
00079 
00080         int                 frame_state;
00081         ogg_int64_t         frames;
00082         unsigned char      *yuvframe[3];
00083 
00084         // The size of each converted frame buffer.
00085         size_t y4m_dst_buf_sz;
00086         // The amount to read directly into the converted frame buffer.
00087         size_t y4m_dst_buf_read_sz;
00088         // The size of the auxilliary buffer.
00089         size_t y4m_aux_buf_sz;
00090         // The amount to read into the auxilliary buffer.
00091         size_t y4m_aux_buf_read_sz;
00092 
00093         ogg_stream_state to; // take physical pages, weld into a logical stream of packets
00094         ogg_stream_state vo; // take physical pages, weld into a logical stream of packets
00095         ogg_page         og; // one Ogg bitstream page.  Vorbis packets are inside
00096         ogg_packet       op; // one raw packet of data for decode
00097 
00098         th_enc_ctx      *td;
00099         th_info          ti;
00100         th_comment       tc;
00101 
00102         vorbis_info      vi; // struct that stores all the static vorbis bitstream settings
00103         vorbis_comment   vc; // struct that stores all the user comments
00104         vorbis_dsp_state vd; // central working state for the packet->PCM decoder
00105         vorbis_block     vb; // local working space for packet->PCM decode
00106 
00107         int audioflag;
00108         int videoflag;
00109 private:
00110         static int ilog(unsigned _v);
00111 };
